ValidationRule.description: Block Appointment creation if the appointment date is passed
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT($User.BypassVR__c), ISNEW(), DATEVALUE(ActivityDateTime)< TODAY(), /* Only for ICON & ICONiCS profiles to avoid impacts on others applications */ CONTAINS($Profile.Name, "ICON") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Your appointment date can not be set to the past
